pages.text: The Path of the Equinox is the path of the elementalist. Control the elements to fry your opponents with lightning, immolate them with fire, or freeze them solid.$(br2)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_equinox_routes)Routes on the Path of the Equinox$(/l)
